name: Last Piece (WetBoxSquad)
description:
We are confined to the space of the flying island. It collapses during our journey. In order not to fall into the abyss, we need to repair it. The player is expected to deploy a large-scale production with factories, warehouses and power generators. It is necessary to build an entire industrial city, aimed at survival in these conditions.

Also, you need to quickly make improvements to buildings and introduce modifications in order to extract resources faster. And then, perhaps, we can get to the mainland.

Controls

Left mouse button to interact and build, right button to cancel. Middle mouse button to rotate the camera.
